main.name: Rahul Rai
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rahul Rai!. I'm 19 years old. I'm a student and work as a ReactJs developer in Shepple technologies.I've been coding for over 2 years now.I love the rush of solving problems, finding creative solutions, and truly having a positive impact on people’s lives while doing something that I love. Coding, for me, is a creative and practical way to do just that, with countless possibilities for me to make a difference in the world due to codings scalable and global nature.I've created so many projects such as LinkedIn Clone, Facebook Clone, Google Clone, Signal Clone, Gmail Clone, Slack Clone,Hulu Clone,Snapchat clone, and many projects created by my own, etc. I’m a nice fun and friendly person. I have a creative mind and am always up for new challenges.I am well organized and always plan ahead to make sure I manage my time well. I have an active and dynamic approach to work and getting things done. I am able to work well both in a team environment as well as using my own initiative.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.title: FullStack Developer
work.description: We develop eCommerce applications, we are Shopify experts, create public and private applications, design themes, create functionalities, help create your first Shopify eCommerce, our goal will always be to help increase your sales in your store.

work.title: React Js Developer
work.description: We seamlessly merge two key components – economics and information technology. This is the main factor that sets us apart from our competition and allows us to deliver a specialist business consultancy service.

testimonials.text: Rahul brings all of the skills and abilities of a driven, established data professional  as he already has the essential characteristics: smart and analytic, fast and responsive, intelligent risk taking, focus. He not only applies those characteristics technically while dealing with data but also while contributing to the Business Decisions .
